name: Pursuit Sport Fishing
description: Our Vancouver fishing charters are year round and offer opportunities to fish for all 5 species of salmon. Vancouver is one of the most beautiful and scenic cities in the world, and the salmon, crab and prawn fishing is excellent. We fish the Vancouver harbour, Georgia Strait, Howe Sound and mouth of the Fraser River 365 days a year. The largest returning runs of pacific salmon ( chinook, coho, sockeye, pink and chum salmon) in the world are here in Vancouver, BC.
